name: Oven Porcupine Meatballs
author: Suzanne Eftink
instructions: Heat oven to 350Â°. Mix meat, rice, 1?2 cup water, onion, salt, garlic powder and pepper. Shape mixture into balls with rounded tablespoon. Place meatballs in ungreased baking dish. Stir together remaining ingredients. Pour over meatballs. Cover with lid or foil and bake 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes more.
